thread.title: Wells Fargo faces record fine for abuses - source

title: Wells Fargo faces record fine for abuses - source
text:
Wells Fargo faces record fine for abuses - source Thursday, April 19, 2018 - 01:20 
Embattled bank Wells Fargo facing yet another penalty. A source telling Reuters Thursday that federal regulators are getting ready to slap a billion dollar penalty on the bank for a variety of alleged misdeeds.   
Embattled bank Wells Fargo facing yet another penalty. A source telling Reuters Thursday that federal regulators are getting ready to slap a billion dollar penalty on the bank for a variety of alleged misdeeds.  //reut.rs/2Hf5Qbb
